text: Galați TV Tower () is a tall concrete tower used for FM and TV broadcasting in Galați, Romania. The tower, completed in 1978, is equipped with a tower restaurant, perhaps the only of this kind in Romania. == External links == * http://skyscraperpage.com/cities/?buildingID=78275 Category:Towers in Romania Category:Buildings and structures in Galați Category:Transmitter sites in Romania Category:Towers completed in 1978 Category:1978 establishments in Romania
title: Galați TV Tower
